alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Washington; Western Addison; Western Chittenden (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Addison, southeastern Chittenden and southwestern Washington Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Huntington, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm has knocked over a tree in Jericho with reported power outages in the region. Locations impacted include... Middlebury, Hinesburg, Huntington, Warren, Bristol, Lincoln, Starksboro, Buels Gore, Granville, Fayston, Monkton, Ripton, Richmond, New Haven, Waitsfield, Roxbury, West Lincoln, Huntington Center, South Starksboro, and South Hinesburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Washington; Western Addison; Western Chittenden
